action: Heat oil in a kadai. Add in sliced onions and fry onions till golden brown. Drain and set aside.
Rinse and soak basmati rice for 1 hour.
Chop up herbs like coriander and mint and set aside..
Fry kishmish and cashews in ghee and set aside.
Soak saffron and food colour in milk and set aside.
Make sure you prepare the shahi garam masala powder as mentioned here.
